fields.title: Attitude towards Vaccination Programs
fields.description: This activity entailed monitoring the attitudes and therefore consequent response behavior to medical campaigns like vaccination.

fields.title: Attitude Towards School
fields.description:
We evaluated the general mindset of the community in regards to school attendance.
This process involved interviewing parents, teachers and school going children. The findings were quite interesting based on a number of factors in the respective homes of the people.

fields.title: Assessment of Land Degradation
fields.description: We made deliberate observations to understand the nature and extents of land deterioration out of careless management of resources.

fields.title: Efficacy of Teaching Programs
fields.description: We donated learning materials like books, pens and portable whiteboards to help facilitate the teaching programs in the area.

fields.title: Cleaning the Local Market
fields.description: We mobilized resources both from our capital and county administration with which we were able to coordinate a successful cleaning program.

fields.title: Building pit latrines in public spaces
fields.description: Having understood that the prevalent cause stomach upset issues was because the markets lacked latrines, we started building about two well managed pits in every subcounty.

fields.title: Academic performance by students in the various counties
fields.description: We intend to evaluate the various performance results from the students who will later sit their national exams.
